      • decryptText

        public HashMap<String,String> decryptText(String _sText)
        Use to decrypt the text inputed by the user.
        Parameters:
        _sText - String that contains the text to decrypt
        Returns:
        Return an HashMap object that contains all the words of the string with the value. The key of the hashmap is the string word The value is the number after the space
